name: In a forest
pages: Dear diary. I have ventured into a rather dense forest. I am pretty sure that on the other side is the civilization I seek. I'm going to set up camp high up in the trees to be safe from these pesky zombies that always seem to find me.
For as dense as this forest is, it seems to be strangely devoid of your typical nasty creatures that lurk in the shadows. I can only hope that this is a positive sign.
